<h1 style="text-align: center;">Welcome to Our Platform</h1>
<p style="text-align: center;">Discover the power of seamless page builder translation. Convert your designs between any framework in seconds.</p>
[/et_pb_text]
[et_pb_button button_text="Get Started" button_url="#features" button_alignment="center" _builder_version="4.16"][/et_pb_button]

[et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.16" custom_padding="60px||60px||true|"]
[et_pb_row column_structure="1_3,1_3,1_3" _builder_version="4.16"]
[et_pb_column type="1_3" _builder_version="4.16"]
[et_pb_blurb title="Universal Translation" use_icon="on" font_icon="&#xe105;" _builder_version="4.16"]
<p>Convert between 10 page builders with 90 translation pairs. Support for Bootstrap, DIVI, Elementor, and more.</p>
[/et_pb_blurb]
[/et_pb_column]
[et_pb_column type="1_3" _builder_version="4.16"]
[et_pb_blurb title="AI-Powered Editing" use_icon="on" font_icon="&#xe0a9;" _builder_version="4.16"]
<p>Edit your pages using natural language with Claude AI. Simply describe the changes you want to make.</p>
[/et_pb_blurb]
[/et_pb_column]
[et_pb_column type="1_3" _builder_version="4.16"]
[et_pb_blurb title="30-Second Conversions" use_icon="on" font_icon="&#xe094;" _builder_version="4.16"]
<p>What used to take 40 hours of manual rebuilding now takes just 30 seconds with our Translation Bridge.</p>
[/et_pb_blurb]
[/et_pb_column]
[/et_pb_row]
[/et_pb_section]
